attributes.additional_details:
Please sign to help save our Youth Clubs across the country.

" Without our Youth Clubs will be forced to hang about in the streets where we will be vulnerable and exposed to the weather. "

" My Youth Workers have helped me when my family couldn't  to build my confidence and prepare me for my future."


"With out my Youth Club I won't be able to do wheelchair football and feel included in sports and activities with able bodied people."

"Why has the Government not consulted with young people about these changes?"

 The Youth of today are the adults of tomorrow. INVEST IN OUR FUTURE NOW
